reviews.review: It's alright i guess

This game is stupidly fun. Between the enemy, weapon, and map variety, plus 7 perks (essentially player classes) to level through, this game has a LOT of replayability and other elements to keep it fresh, on top of being straight-up addicting. I highly recommend this to anybody who is a fan of horde-mode style co-op.
Bom demais xD
great fun tongue-in-cheek team action, rewarding leveling system, addictive mechanics, excellent seasonal content (halloween events, christmas events, etc.)

Killing Whores is a game that is great fun for the whole family! Play with your mum and dad or with your kids 6 years and above! Featuring a solid soundtrack from well-known and talented singers like Katy Perry, Bob Marley and Iggy Azalea! You get to shoot pew pew guns and make the bad monsters explode into little red fluffy things which is just chunks of flesh. It's just a little gorey but hey that is the mark of a family-oriented video game. A truly euphoric and fluffy experience. 3.14/10

Horas y horas de diversión. El juego te ofrece distintas clases y con ellas una forma nueva de enfrentarse al juego. Desde el cuerpo a cuerpo al disparo lejano pasando por explosivos, armas de fuego rápido y escopetas. Además los niveles de dificultad más alto requieren solidaridad y trabajo en equipo. Totalmente recomendable, sobre todo con amigos. Mejor que el segundo.

A really fun game for you and your "friends".

Basically Left 4 dead, done right

At first this game seemed to be only an attempt for another co-op horror, especially when L4D was already on scene. After 300h of gameplay I can say one thing - this game is unique and have a lot of stuff to dig in. Every play delivers something new, and one small mistake of your companion can bury the team's dream. Only the toughest win. That's how it goes!

Este jogo é fabuloso! Perfeito para se jogar com a família e pessoas de sua igreja, 


Observe mais em youtube.com/epiccruz

[h1]Good[/h1]
KF has this magic charm that takes Half Life graphics and hilariously bad voice-acting and uses it to build a grindhouse game atmosphere instead of detracting from it. Punchy, powerful weapons, fast gameplay against powerful specimens and a lot of diverse, sprawling maps. Tons and tons of modded servers. 


[h1]Bad[/h1]
KF's been criticized for really slow progression and a "Perk" system that makes a low-tier player useless compared to a high-level one. This means you'll have a terrible time if you get into a server on Suicidal or Hell on Earth somehow as a low-level perk, and probably kicked.

[h1]DLC[/h1]
A few reskin guns and slew of cosmetic ones, you also get content from Portal, and some TWI products like Rising Storm or Red Orchestra 2 if you also own them.

[h1]Worth?[/h1]
Call it a $10 game. Comes for free with KF2 deluxe.

Ya, the game isnt perfect and the graphics and blockiness "feel" to the game was a slight downer, but I have had more fun playing this game than i thought posible! Would have bought for 20 bucks if i had to, and playing this with friends is always a blast. 7.4 out of 10 from me. Definitely worth the buy if you have friends that play.

As good as the gameplay is, I can't recommend this game. Paid-for games shouldn't contain in-game advertising, especially for other games or products. Tripwire Interactive seems to be of the opposite opinion.

The main menu has ads for the latest DLC. The character selection screen has more DLC characters than vanilla characters. The trader screen is bloated with all the DLC weapons you haven't bought. One weapon can only be unlocked by playing an entirely different game. Worst of all, the pre-game lobby includes obnoxious video ads not only for DLC, but for one of Tripwire's other games.

Of all the games I've bought on Steam, [i]Killing Floor[/i] is the absolute worst offender when it comes to in-game advertising. I can't get my money back, but I can at least recommend you save yours.

Este jogo eh mt bom, ele segue a mesma linha de left 4 Dead, porem com uma opcao a mais para ir no modo objetivo que acrescenta apenas poucas diferencas, como matar um certo tipo de inimigo, ou um tanto de inimigos ja definido, algumas pessoas acham ele ruim pelos seus gráficos, mas para quem gosta de um bom jogo de fps coop (ao estilo left 4 Dead), ele eh uma escolha perfeita.

OBS:Por ele ser um jogo muito bom os desenvolvedores se "aproveitaram" um pouco a mais de nois, lancando, dlcs, e pacotes com armas e novos personagens, coisas que deveriam vir ao comprar o jogo, mas nada que deixe o gamer irritado ao ponto de nao jogar.
Dosh, grab it while you can lads.

Zombis... Y muerte.
Armas... Y desesperación.
Con eso ya os puedo describir todo el juego. Es basicamente un deathmatch por oleadas de zombies. Bien pensado, perks, personajes, armas. Todo lo que uno puede desear, pero su tienda (Si no recuerdo mal es puramente cosmética) es increiblemente densa. Si se te pasa por la cabeza meterte y ver un personaje que te encantaría probar y y jamas de los jamases podras usar si no pagas dinero real, pues desanima XD.

Pero si lo quereis para jugar solos o con amigos simplemente para reventar cabezas. Si. Este y Left4Dead son dos buenos titulos.

Ты когда-нибудь получал оргазм от музыки? А от игры? А от того и другого вместе?:) 
Нет, не получал, если не играл в Killing Floor. 

Саунды - первое, что я хотела бы отметить в этой игре. Ты обязан сделать громкость музыки на максимум, а вопли своей девушки на минимум. Пусть не мешает наслаждаться.

Нет, это не очередной зомби-шутер. Ведь ОНИ - не зомби, а "неудачный" эксперимент, вырвавшийся на свободу. В этом и прелесть, ведь ИМ не нужны твои мозги. ОНИ хотят тебя всего. Желательно по кусочкам. Переживешь 10 горячих волн?
Да, потому что здесь есть ПЕРКИ. Именно, детка, ты можешь прокачать определенные навыки, чтобы надрать ИМ зад ;-)
Хочешь жечь, как я? Бери огнемет. А хочешь, завари эти чертовы двери, чтобы они не достали нас. Или, может, ты хочешь взорвать все к чертям? Тогда бери взрывчатки, детка, и покажи, на что способен. Я посмотрю.

Я не пишу про графу. Мы оценим ее во второй части. Здесь "соль" в другом. Хочешь понять в чем? Ответ найдешь в самой игре ;-)

Habla de las historia de un cientifico llamado Paco-Pepe que por desgracia mete la piedra que encontro en un descampado dentro de un enchufe por error. Gracias a eso, creo un vortice interdimensional de la hostia que provocaba que la gente comprase productos de limpieza del Corte ingles. El juego tiene la colaboracion especial de algunos actores famosos, como son Bruce Lee (Que hace de Chino Cudeiro), Willyrex (Que hace de Miñoneti que sale en varias escenas con helicopteros pilotados por una patata rosa) y algun que otra pulga que encontramos en los huevos de Leo-NARDO Dicaprio. Al final la historia acaba con un romance entre uno de los HeadCrabs (Cangrejos pinchones) con uno de los cientificos, lo que hace que se apareen hasta el fin de los dias creando un colapso interdimensional entre los 2 mundos, el de los politicos con paraisos fiscales y el mundo de los hongos. Gracias a ello el protagonista Gordo Freeman consigue parar los pies a los moicanos del bosque que intentaban tomar el control de Madrid, sometiendo asi al hombre blanco y azul que gobernaban aquellas tierras por esos tiempos. Al final del juego podemos presenciar una gran escena erotica Willyrex y un niño rata que desemboca en una pelea por el control de Albulquerque, en la que finalmente gana un panadero que pasaba por alli, ya que uso su habilidad especial de meter una barra de pan en el congelador, y luego partirle la crisma a su enemigo con ella.
Despues de los creditos podemos apreciar una gran cinematica en la que el Jefe Maestro, tambien llamado Tomas Turbado, primo de Jorge Nitales y hermano segundo de Elena Nito Del bosque se come un yogurt sin echarle azucar antes, una hazaña que pocos han logrado sin poner la cara que pone el Fary al chupar un limon.

Killing Floor is a Co-op Survival Horror FPS set in the devastated cities and countryside of England after a series of cloning experiments for the military goes horribly wrong. You and your friends are members of the military dropped into these locations with a simple mission: Survive long enough to cleanse the area of the failed experiments! 
Cooperative gameplay for up to six players against multiple waves of specimens 
Persistent Perks system, allowing players to convert their in-game achievements into permanent improvements to their character's skills and abilities 
Over 170 Steam Achievements, including “Dignity for the dead” for killing 10 enemies feeding on dead teammates' corpses and “Hot Cross Fun” for finishing off 25 burning enemies with a Crossbow 
Slow-motion “ZEDtime” to better watch those crucial and violent creature deaths, even in multiplayer 
Solo game mode for offline play 
Ten different monster types trying to eat your face off, armed with everything from teeth and claws, to chainsaws, chain-guns and rocket-launchers 
33+ weapons for the players to chose from, ranging from knives and fire-axes to pump shotguns, rifles and a flamethrower 
Equip your team with welders, medical tools and body armor to help your odds of survival 
Choose which Perks to play with to best balance out your co-op team against the horrors 
Open, non-linear play areas: choose when and where to fight — or run; weld doors closed to direct the monster horde down alternate corridors 
Fully-configurable, allowing players to change the difficulty level, number of creature waves, or even set up their own favorite waves of monsters 
Support for Steam Friends and other Steamworks features 
Includes Windows-only SDK for the creation of new levels and mods                    Good Game
Хорошая интересная игра!
Is Good game fun for whole family

I feel as if Killing Floor is one of the underdogs of FPS games. Some dislike its graphics, others criticize its seemingly repetitive and redundant gameplay. But to those who have devoted at least a few hours in this game will understand that Killing Floor is not just some zombie FPS game. It is a game that defines what teamwork should be, in my opinion, especially in FPS games. This game is the best way to learn teamwork, tactics, and decision-making for when to stay and fight, and when to hit and run. The main theme of the game is teamwork, and it's not just working as a team. You have to learn to work together, understand each other, protect and fight for each other. If you don't help each other out in this game, you're gonna be another corpse on the road ingame.

Also the British accents. R8 8/8, M8.
Elder Scrolls 5 - Skyrim

Killing floor is like your classic standard zombie survival game. Waves of zombies come and you, or yourself and your squad have to defend against waves of the undead to advance.  What makes killing floor really stand out is its ability to add alot more to the basics. Killing floor adds ten Different kinds of specimans, all with different attributes that make them a serious predator to you, and your squad. The games mechanics make it alot more difficult to just weave in and out of the horde and escape, taking a Counter strike feature where running with your knife out will allow for faster movement speed. but all the specimans have different ways of slowing you down. the game provides you with 7 uniqe classes, all with different weaponry bonuses and a uniqe way at helping your squad survive. with multiple different maps, different players, different difficulty's, And a ton of costomizability to your character and his/her weaponry killing floor is sure to leave you wanting more and more hordes to kill with your friends. definitely worth the Dosh
